Major/minor: Major
Error location 2: "Ich werde Ihnen gerne behilflich sein"
Explanation for error 2: The incorrect translation changes the meaning of the original phrase by using "werden" (become) instead of "bin" (am) and "behilflich sein" (be helpful) instead of "zu helfen" (to help).

Major/minor: Minor
